name: Cirno Clicker ⑨
description:
Welcum to Cirno Clicker. THE Game about clicking Cirno and forced labor. Set to release the 9/9/2022!

Build your empire of Snowflakes and save up your Fumo points for one of the precious Fumos!

What are you waiting for? Play NOW!
